Visualization Gallery

A gallery of visualization types available in the METAINFORMANT visualization module.

Basic Plots

  • Line plots: Time series, trends, continuous data

  • Scatter plots: Correlation analysis, 2D data exploration

  • Bar charts: Categorical comparisons, counts

  • Pie charts: Proportional data

  • Area plots: Cumulative data, filled line plots

  • Heatmaps: 2D matrix visualization

Statistical Plots

  • Histograms: Distribution analysis

  • Box plots: Summary statistics, outliers

  • Violin plots: Distribution shapes

  • Q-Q plots: Distribution comparison

  • Density plots: Smooth distributions

  • Ridge plots: Overlapping distributions

  • ROC curves: Classification performance

  • Precision-recall curves: Classification metrics

  • Residual plots: Regression diagnostics

Genomic Plots

  • Manhattan plots: Genome-wide association

  • Volcano plots: Differential expression

  • Regional plots: Locus-specific views

  • Circular Manhattan plots: Circular genome view

  • Chromosome ideograms: Chromosome maps

  • Coverage plots: Sequencing coverage

  • Variant plots: Variant visualization

Expression Plots

  • Expression heatmaps: Gene expression matrices

  • Enrichment plots: Pathway/gene set analysis

  • Differential expression plots: Top DE genes

  • Log fold change plots: FC distributions

Dimensionality Reduction

  • PCA plots: Principal component visualization

  • UMAP plots: UMAP embeddings

  • t-SNE plots: t-SNE embeddings

  • PCA scree plots: Variance explained

  • PCA loadings plots: Feature contributions

  • Biplots: Samples and loadings together

Network Plots

  • Network graphs: Node-edge visualizations

  • Circular layouts: Circular network arrangements

  • Hierarchical layouts: Tree-based networks

  • Force-directed layouts: Spring-based positioning

  • Community networks: Color-coded communities

Time Series

  • Time series plots: Temporal data visualization

  • Autocorrelation plots: Temporal dependencies

  • Seasonal decomposition: Trend, seasonal, residual

  • Forecast plots: Predictions with confidence intervals

  • Trend analysis: Linear/polynomial trends

Multi-dimensional

  • Pair plots: Scatter plot matrices

  • Parallel coordinates: Multi-dimensional data

  • Radar charts: Multi-attribute comparison

  • 3D scatter plots: Three-dimensional data

Quality Control

  • QC metrics plots: Multiple QC visualizations

  • Quality score plots: Score distributions

  • Per-base quality: Position-specific quality

  • Adapter content: Adapter contamination

  • Sequence length: Length distributions

Information Theory

  • Entropy plots: Entropy across positions

  • Mutual information: MI matrices

  • Information profiles: Comprehensive profiles

  • Rényi spectra: Entropy order analysis

  • Information networks: MI-based networks

Trees

  • Phylogenetic trees: Standard tree layouts

  • Circular trees: Circular layouts

  • Unrooted trees: Unrooted visualizations

  • Tree comparisons: Side-by-side trees

  • Annotated trees: Trees with annotations

Animations

  • Time series animations: Growing line plots

  • Evolution animations: Evolutionary processes

  • Clustering animations: Iterative clustering

  • Network animations: Network evolution

  • Trajectory animations: Trajectory inference
